content.rendered:
Personal statement

I am a keen and quick learner of new technologies and programming/development languages. Having worked for a company with over 240 active clients, I have had experience working with people from a variety of backgrounds,both technical and non-technical. These have given me the opportunity to tackle a variety of problems with different techniques and as a result, I have gained the foundations of many different web languages. I have had experience working with people from a variety of backgrounds, both technical and non-technical; which has led me to be able to adapt my communication skills based on the requirements of who I’m speaking to.

Key skills

Experience

  • Nearly 10 years of industry experience as a Front end web engineer
  • Front and backend development of websites using the latest technologies
  • Integration of third party APIs such as payment gateways, warehouse/stock management systems and XMLdata feeds.

Programming

  • Web: ​PHP, HTML5, CSS3, LESS/Sass, Media queries, jQuery, Bootstrap framework, AJAX, XML
  • Automation: ​IFTTT, Zapier, Browserstack, Git, Webpack, NPM/Node, Azure DevOps
  • Web Platforms: ​WordPress, Magento1 & 2, Opencart, PhoneGap, Dynamics365
  • Database/Server Management:​ SQL, Linux, cPanel, Microsoft Azure

Office tools

  • Microsoft Office Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Slack, Asana, Harvest, Podio
  • Photoshop, Illustrator, Flash, InDesign
  • Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code, PuTTY, CLI

Communication

  • Communicating with major stakeholders of businesses
  • Project management of my own work and other members of the team.
